description: The plot thickens as Matt Cody (Owen Hawk) seduces his boss Tom Mercedes (Kent Larson). The two find themselves getting hot and heavy on the companys boardroom table, where some heavy 69ing is all the rage. Then the cleaning guy (Mario Ortiz) joins in the fun. The threesome take turns pounding each other to the point of orgasm. This scene redefines the word "versatility."
title: Owen Hawk, Kent Larson, and Mario Ortiz
